CustomField.description: ACAUTION - USED IN INTEGRATIONS clearance line is a feature that can be booked with premium level calls only. This line enables the chairperson to speak with an operator during pre-conference through the first 15 minutes of the call, to clear any participants on a restricted list
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select "Yes" if a clearance line has been requested.
CustomField.label: Clearance Line
